# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(HelloAyan LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
add_executable(HelloAyan "")
set_target_properties(HelloAyan PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "HelloAyan")
set_target_properties(HelloAyan PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "c:/Users/User/Github/AyanBot/build/windows/x86/debug")
add_dependencies(HelloAyan ayan)
target_include_directories(HelloAyan PRIVATE
    include
    dep
    dep/fmt/include
    dep/optional/include
    dep/result/include
    dep/source_location/include
    dep/sol/include
    dep/pybind11/include
)
target_include_directories(HelloAyan INTERFACE
    include
)
if (MSVC)
    target_compile_options(HelloAyan PRIVATE $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/std:c++latest>)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(HelloAyan PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Debug>:-Od>)
else()
    target_compile_options(HelloAyan PRIVATE -O0)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(HelloAyan PRIVATE -Zi)
else()
    target_compile_options(HelloAyan PRIVATE -g)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET HelloAyan PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(HelloAyan PRIVATE
    ayan
)
target_link_directories(HelloAyan PRIVATE
    c:/Users/User/Github/AyanBot/build/windows/x86/debug
)
target_sources(HelloAyan PRIVATE
    src/main.cpp
)

# target
add_library(ayan STATIC "")
set_target_properties(ayan PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "ayan")
set_target_properties(ayan PROPERTIES ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "c:/Users/User/Github/AyanBot/build/windows/x86/debug")
target_include_directories(ayan PRIVATE
    include
    dep
    dep/fmt/include
    dep/optional/include
    dep/result/include
    dep/source_location/include
    dep/sol/include
    dep/pybind11/include
)
target_include_directories(ayan INTERFACE
    include
    dep
    dep/fmt/include
    dep/optional/include
    dep/result/include
    dep/source_location/include
    dep/sol/include
    dep/pybind11/include
)
if (MSVC)
    target_compile_options(ayan PRIVATE $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/std:c++latest>)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(ayan PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Debug>:-Od>)
else()
    target_compile_options(ayan PRIVATE -O0)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(ayan PRIVATE -Zi)
else()
    target_compile_options(ayan PRIVATE -g)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET ayan PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_sources(ayan PRIVATE
    src/core/logger.cpp
    src/core/qmsg.cpp
)
